document.full_text: with no sign of judgment day arriving on saturday as forecast by an 89 year-old california evangelical broadcaster, followers were faced with trying to make sense of his failed pronouncement.
document.title: as hours tick by, "judgment day" looks a dud
lines_and_colors: with no sign of judgment day arriving on saturday as forecast by an 89 year-old california evangelical broadcaster, followers were faced with trying to make sense of his failed pronouncement.
